meanings.definition: Murrhas (noun): a type of plant commonly found in tropical regions.
meanings.sent1: The murrhas in the garden bloomed beautifully.
meanings.sent2: I saw a murrhas while hiking in the rainforest.
meanings.sent3: The monkeys enjoyed swinging from the murrhas branches.
meanings.sent4: The murrhas stood tall like a guardian of the forest.
meanings.sent5: The vibrant colors of the murrhas brightened the jungle.

meanings.definition: Murrhas (verb): to express strong disapproval or disagreement.
meanings.sent1: She murrhased loudly when she heard the news.
meanings.sent2: He always murrhases when someone interrupts him.
meanings.sent3: The cat seemed to murrhas at the sight of the vacuum cleaner.
meanings.sent4: His eyes murrhased with frustration as he shook his head.
meanings.sent5: The teacher murrhased sternly at the misbehaving students.

meanings.definition: Murrhas (adjective): having a strong, unpleasant odor.
meanings.sent1: The murrhas fruit emitted a foul smell.
meanings.sent2: The room was filled with the murrhas scent.
meanings.sent3: The old shoes had a murrhas stench that made everyone cringe.
meanings.sent4: The garbage bin had a murrhas odor that lingered in the air.
meanings.sent5: The murrhas perfume was definitely not to my liking.
